one_reviews_text:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wXtoRTVSDZE

My Quick Thoughts:
A cool and very cute puzzle platforming game in the style of Lucky's Tale but with a Zelda vibe.
The ability to grab the terrain and move it around to work out where to go and what to do is a really cool mechanic and works great here.
This is not just a straight forward platformer, you will need to manipulate the environment to help you succeed.

review_title: Not in spanish and not gamepad
one_reviews_text:
It is a bad idea to make a platform without being able to use the gamepad.
And it is even worse not to translate it into the most spoken and extended language in the world, Spanish
